title: New Update: He's A Millionaire And His Girlfriend Has NO Idea!
description:
He is rolling in dough, like, really, millions of dollars worth; and to anyone else, this would be great news, but for our listener, he’s worried that this news could really make or break his relationship simply because he’s been with his girlfriend for a year and has yet to tell her.

A few years ago, our listener's grandfather passed away and, in his will, he left millions of dollars for him and his brothers.

Apparently, his family status is so major, everyone in the state of Pennsylvania knows about them… aside from his girlfriend.

Our listener never wanted his financial status to be the reason that someone dates him, so, for a year, he hid this secret from his girlfriend in hopes of keeping their relationship authentic.

Well, it worked and now they’re in love, like, really in love, but he thinks spilling the beans on this one thing will really turn things around for the worse.
THE UPDATE:Now that we've heard more of behind the scenes, this whole strategy of being "frugal" isn't quite sitting so well with us...
